summary: Utility module that implements lazy deserialization of PyTorch checkpoints. It defines a custom unpickler that resolves class references and persistent objects only when accessed, and a proxy object that represents tensors whose data is loaded on demand. Helper functions coordinate loading of distributed checkpoints, extracting tensors, materializing them, and moving state dictionaries into model structures.
